title: Protective earthing
fullText:
The supply to each switchboard or service pillar supplying socket-outlets for supply to connectable electrical installations shall include a protective earthing conductor with a minimum size of 16mm2.
In accordance with Clause 2.1.4, where a common submain supplies more than one service pillar or switchboard, disconnection of the protective earthing conductor at any switchboard service pillar or switchboard shall not adversely affect the earthing of any other service pillars or switchboards.
